title: De mortuorum resurrectione, & extremo iuditio in quatuor linguis succincte conscriptum opusculu[m]. Ioanne Clerco autore. cui, ut studiosa iuuenta facilius peregrinarum linguarum comprehenderet mysteria, recenter accessere eiusdem autoris Italicæ & Gallicæ verborum coniugationes
author: Clerk, John, d. 1552.
publicationStmtPublisher: By John̄ Herforde for Roberte Toye, dwellynge in Paules churche yarde, at the signe of the Bell],
